<Dr. Leopoldo Figueroa
1:
--------------------
Text: Leopoldo Figueroa:  Figueroa, who began his political career as an advocate of Puerto Rican Independence, was the co-founder of the "Independence Association", one of three political organizations which merged to form the Puerto Rican Nationalist Party.
